post.body: also, did i mention that i am 3 months old today?
wtf. you pay people to poke me with needles? this is why two moms shouldn't raise babies. abuse, i tell you. ABUSE.
i find it quite effortless to nurse for 3 hours straight.
celebrating one month on the outside by having one more round of milk...
hmmm. my cozy home is squeezing around me every five minutes or so. this is not comfortable. wtf.
i think i may stay in this warm womby place forever. it's just so...cozy.
my mom is sitting on castor oil while my other mom watches. both are twittering about this. do i really want to be born?
i totally punk'd my moms last night. midwives came. big party thinking i was coming and then...nope. suckers!
hey guess what? i can now be born at home. not sure how long i'll hang out in the womb. i'm giving mixed signals.
everytime my mother eats, i gets a massive case of hiccups. think i'll punch her bladder in frustration.
contemplating an early arrival into the outside world. why wait till june, right?
i wonder what will happen if i press the button that says "sciatic nerve, do not press".
blissed out after my incubator/mother ate raisin nut bran. at 5:30 am. i love wielding such control. bet i can make her pee in 5 minutes...
